RdKafka::ConsumeCb

RdKafka::ConsumeCb Class Reference

#include <rdkafkacpp.h>

Detailed Description

Consume callback class.

Member Function Documentation

virtual void RdKafka::ConsumeCb::consume_cb ( Message &  message,
void *  opaque 
) [pure virtual]

The consume callback is used with RdKafka::Consumer::consume_callback() methods and will be called for each consumed message.

The callback interface is optional but provides increased performance.
